column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2017
column14: I bought this product in October of 2016, because I purchase a replacement for what I take out of the closet so I always have back up. Well when I went to use this product a week ago, it did not have Paul Mitchell shampoo in the bottle. Do not know what it is but it has left sores on my scalp. Buyer beware, you may not get what you paid for.

column6: Excellent quality shampoo but you won't receive it all!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
column14: I absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner. But for the price, it was disappointing to only get a little bit more than half of the bottle upon arrival. A bag was wrapped around the bottle but it still had opened and leaked everywhere. I wasn't home when it was delivered so I paid 24 bucks for half a bottle!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
column14: I’ve used this shampoo many times and thought it was the best! Normally you only require a small amount and it laters up very well. This seller must have watered it down as the consistency was different and I needed a minimum of 10 pumps to get a little bit of a lather. This shampoo is great but I would not purchase from this seller.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
column14: Was like milk. Product so thin it ran thru my fingers. DISAPPOINTED!!! Smelt like Vicks vaporub! Ordered same product from Amazon and ship by Amazon and huge difference in product.

column6: Delivered inferior product.  Not at all the same as previously ordered item.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
column14: I've ordered and used this shampoo for years.  This bottle came and the shampoo is like water.  I don't know what happened but unfortunately I didn't open the bottle until the last one was finished, so it was too late to return.  It's a shame, this is a pricey product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2020
column14: My wife's hair is quite thin and fragile on the ends because it was bleached several times. But she says that is the only shampoo that allows running her fingers through the hair while washing even before the conditioner is used. She combines it with a conditioner from the same line. The hair is shiny, silky, and healthy, even the damaged locks shine. It cleans well without drying out the hair, works well for oily hair and scalp.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2019
Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
column14: The shampoo leaked out all over. Even though it was in a plastic bag, it leaked out of the bag. I’m not happy to pay for something that has now leaked & I’m not getting all of the product.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2019
column14: This shampoo is excellent at keeping my highlights from turning orange and my natural hair color is a very warm dark brown.  It’s only goal is to turn orange.  Since I went grey around my face/hairline I’m trying to blend ash blonde highlights with my grey in order to soften the contrast between my dark hair and the grey.  I need my highlights to stay as light as possible and if it weren’t for this shampoo I couldn’t pull it off.  I’ve always had to go to the salon every 6 to 8 weeks until I found this shampoo.  Now I can keep my highlights light for 3 months easy.  I’ve tried about 5 other brands and this is the first one that is so dark purple it’s almost black.  I did the math and this shampoo saves me about $500 a year in salon visits and I go through about 4 10oz. bottles per year.

column6: I found this just to be OK for what I wanted it for
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
column14: I have blonde hair with a little bit of low lights. I'd say my blonde is about a level 9. I got this based off of the reviews and really didn't see much of anything. I tried it twice and thought it would do well in between toning visits which are about every 2.5 to 3 months. It wasn't drying is all I can say. I've used other color based shampoos that work better to stay bright, but were way to drying as I have hair to my waist.....so? Maybe this would be great for periodic use on gray/white hair that wants to stay bright is my guess?

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
column14: I used this to get rid of yellowish tinge in my hair.  I had previously used another product for this from Keene but I couldn’t find it. I thought this would be the same, that maybe the name had been changed. Instead I ended up with purple splotches in my hair. I was only using it about once a week. Luckily, my stylist was able to cut most of it out. If I decide to try it again, I’ll try rinsing it out right away.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
column14: Absolutely the best purple shampoo on the market. I love this brand. Well with the pricem works great ... Smells wonderful

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2019
column14: There’s purple color all over the  bottle specially on the top  ....it seems like it’s been used  :(

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
column14: Definitely works for maintaining my highlights. It’s helps with the brassy tones.  Would definitely buy again.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
column14: Recommended by the best stylists and I love it!!

column6: Lightweight shampoo leaves blonde highlights looking amazing
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
column14: Great purple shampoo.  Doesn’t leave your hair weighted down.  Nice effect on my blonde highlights!
